scripts.synth:windows: copy test/.env.local.template .env && cdk synth > template.yaml && move template.yaml cdk.out
scripts.synth: cp test/.env.local.template .env && cdk synth > template.yaml && mv template.yaml cdk.out
scripts.start-local: npm run synth && cd cdk.out && sam local start-api --debug
scripts.build-and-start-local: npm run build-and-bundle && npm run start-local
scripts.deploy: npm run bootstrap && cdk deploy --require-approval never
